templateContent: Hi {firstName}, welcome to Trade Alliance Group! We're excited to work with you. If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out. Thanks for choosing us!
Hi {preferredName}, we've updated your contact details. Name: {firstName} {surname}, Email: {email}, Phone: {phone}. Please confirm this is correct by replying YES or call us to make changes.
Hi {firstName}, just following up on our recent conversation. If you have any questions about Trade Alliance Group services, feel free to contact us. We're here to help!
Hello {preferredName}, this is a reminder from Trade Alliance Group. Please contact us if you need any assistance. We appreciate your business!
